title: Are McDonald’s Hamburgers 100% Beef?
subtitle: Rumor holds that McDonald's buys their meat from a company called '100% Beef,' which allows them to legally but deceptively claim they use 100% beef in their hamburgers.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: McDonald's buys their meat from a company called '100% Beef,' which allows them to legally but deceptively claim they use 100% beef in their hamburgers.
